errors.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist.

apiError.networkErrorMessage: We're having trouble connecting to our servers. Please try again in a few moments.
apiError.serverErrorMessage: Something went wrong on our end. We're working on it. Please try again shortly.
apiError.genericErrorMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

home.title: Lao Cinema
home.subtitle: Lao Films
home.noFilmsDescription: Check back soon for new content

movies.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, cast, or crew...
movies.searchForPeopleDescription: Enter a name to find actors, directors, and crew members
movies.searchForProductionDescription: Enter a name to find production companies and studios

movie.comingSoonMessage: This film will be available to watch soon. Check back later!
movie.unavailableMessage: This film is not currently available to watch.

watch.gracePeriodWarning: Your rental has expired, but you have {time} remaining to finish watching. Don't close this page!

video.unableToConnectServer: Unable to connect to video server. Please check your connection and try again.
video.streamInterrupted: Video stream interrupted. Please check your connection and try again.
video.networkError: Network error occurred. Please try again.
video.mediaError: Media playback error. Attempting to recover...
video.genericError: An error occurred while loading the video.
video.unableToLoad: Unable to load video. Please check your connection and try again.
video.youWereAt: You were at {time}. Would you like to continue from where you left off?

payment.title: Rent Movie
payment.description: Scan the QR code to rent "{movie}" for 24 hours
payment.descriptionRequired: To watch "{movie}", you'll need to rent it first. Rentals last 24 hours.
payment.descriptionExpired: Your rental of "{movie}" has expired. Rent again to continue watching.
payment.scanInstructions: Scan with your banking app to complete payment
payment.demoNotice: Demo mode: No actual payment required
payment.recentlyExpired: Your rental has expired. Rent again to continue watching.

admin.noPeopleFound: No people found matching your search.
admin.noPeopleYet: No people in the database yet. Import a movie to add cast and crew.
admin.noMoviesFound: No movies found matching your search.
admin.noMoviesYet: No movies in the database yet.
admin.selectHomepageFilms: Select which films appear on the homepage
admin.noMoviesYetImport: No movies yet. Import one from TMDB to get started!

analytics.title: Video Analytics
analytics.description: Track how viewers engage with your content
analytics.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all analytics data? This cannot be undone.
analytics.noDataDescription: Start watching movies to generate analytics data. Each play session will be tracked here.
analytics.mostWatchedMovies: Most watched movies by total time
analytics.mostPopularMovies: Most popular movies by unique viewers
analytics.noDataForMovieDescription: No one has watched this movie yet.
analytics.movieAnalyticsDescription: Detailed viewing analytics for this film
analytics.allViewingSessions: All viewing sessions for this movie

login.title: Sign In - Lao Cinema
login.description: Sign in to your Lao Cinema account

register.title: Create Account - Lao Cinema
register.description: Create a Lao Cinema account to sync your rentals

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password - Lao Cinema
forgotPassword.heading: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.emailSentMessage: If an account exists with this email, we've sent a password reset link. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
forgotPassword.correctEmail: Make sure you entered the correct email
forgotPassword.waitAndRetry: Wait a few minutes and try again

resetPassword.title: Reset Password - Lao Cinema
resetPassword.description: Create a new password for your account
resetPassword.heading: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below.
resetPassword.invalidTokenMessage: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been updated. You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email - Lao Cinema
verifyEmail.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your email address.
verifyEmail.successMessage: Your email address has been successfully verified.
verifyEmail.errorMessage: We couldn't verify your email. The link may be expired or invalid.
verifyEmail.invalidLinkMessage: This verification link is missing or invalid.

profile.title: My Profile - Lao Cinema
profile.description: Manage your Lao Cinema account and view your activity
profile.manageAccount: Manage your account and view your activity

emailVerification.sentMessage: Verification email sent! Check your inbox.

quickLinks.myRentalsDesc: View your rented movies and rental history
quickLinks.continueWatchingDesc: Resume movies from where you left off
quickLinks.settingsDesc: Manage your account settings and preferences

edit.title: Edit Profile
edit.subtitle: Update your display name
edit.displayNameHelp: This is how your name will appear across the site

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your security and account preferences

timezone.title: Time Zone
timezone.description: Set your timezone to display dates and times correctly
timezone.label: Your Time Zone
timezone.help: All dates and times will be displayed in your selected timezone

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Update your password to keep your account secure
password.requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.errorMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.confirmMessage: This will log you out from all devices including this one. You'll need to log in again.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
deleteAccount.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone
deleteAccount.warningMessage: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data, including rentals and watch history. This action cannot be reversed.
deleteAccount.confirmMessage: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

rentals.title: My Rentals
rentals.subtitle: View and manage your rented movies
rentals.noActiveDesc: You don't have any active rentals at the moment.
rentals.noExpiredDesc: Your past rentals will appear here.

continueWatching.title: Continue Watching
continueWatching.subtitle: Resume your movies from where you left off
continueWatching.noProgressDesc: Movies you've started watching will appear here.
